rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall leading to the main living area and connecting corridor.
Spacious open-plan living area with ample natural light, connected to the dining area.
Modern dining space adjacent to the kitchen, featuring a breakfast bar and view of garden.
Functional kitchen layout designed for efficiency, incorporating storage and modern appliances.
Private study area with soundproofing and ample natural lighting.
Guest bathroom located near living area.
Patio area overlooking the swimming pool, perfect for relaxation or hosting guests.

vastu_considerations.description: The villa is oriented with the main entrance facing east or north to maximize natural light and positive energy.
Rooms are arranged in a manner that promotes harmony between work, relaxation, and dining areas. Bedrooms are positioned so as not to be directly aligned with the main entrance.

building_norms.compliance: Plot is utilized efficiently with designated spaces for garden, pool, and living quarters

building_norms.description: Adequate setbacks are observed from plot boundaries to comply with local building codes.
Design considers load-bearing structures in line with Indian standards.

additional_features.description: Each bedroom is designed with a spacious balcony, promoting open space and ventilation while adhering to Vastu recommendations for private outdoor areas.
The villa includes an integrated swimming pool in the garden area, complete with proper drainage and safety features.
A landscaped garden that surrounds the building offering recreational space and enhancing aesthetics.
